title: Unfulfilled Heart
opening: The Bern royal family is a pageant of power, love, and hate. Eliwood finds himself embroiled in their troubles. He has been sent to recover the Bern family treasure: the Fire Emblem. It has been stolen from the palace vault. Eliwood enters the royal palace seeking clues.

Hector and his allies defeat the Black Fang monster, Pascal. However, they learn nothing of the Fire Emblem's location. To escape from the Black Fang, they disguise themselves once more. At Eliwood's suggestion, they head for the royal palace of Bern.

intro.speaker: Hector
intro.line: We've finally arrived. I can't believe they built a palace in these mountains.

intro.speaker: Eliwood
intro.line: Bern is the only country on the continent where wyverns still fly. With its wyvern-riders, I imagine this castle is the best-defended anywhere.

intro.speaker: Lyn
intro.line: I agree. Look at the path leading up the mountain's face. It would be impossible to scale that in a direct assault.

intro.speaker: Hector
intro.line: Defenders positioned higher up would have a clear advantage. Even the best soldiers would be taken out with ease. Hm... Look at that. They don't have any sentries posted. They must have a lot of faith in their defenses.

intro.speaker: Eliwood
intro.line: Look at these surroundings! They probably make do simply with patrols within the castle. The mighty Bern. I'd not like it as an enemy.

intro.speaker: Lyn
intro.line: And yet, from this impregnable fortress, a treasure was stolen. Perhaps the king really is responsible for all this. It's hard to imagine any thief cracking Bern's defenses.

intro.speaker: Eliwood
intro.line: You're right. But I can't imagine why the king would do this. To find the Fire Emblem, we're going to need clues.

intro.speaker: Lyn
intro.line: Listen, why don't we try sneaking into the castle?

intro.speaker: Hector
intro.line: That's what I was waiting for! I like the way you think.

intro.speaker: Eliwood
intro.line: Whatever happens, we must not be caught. If it looks impossible, turn around and come back here.

intro.speaker: Hector
intro.line: Got it!

intro.speaker: Lyn
intro.line: Of course!

intro.speaker: Lyn
intro.line: This is... An inner garden?

intro.speaker: Eliwood
intro.line: Shh! Someone's coming this way.

intro.speaker: Hector
intro.line: Here! Into this thicket!!

intro.speaker: Guinivere
intro.line: Brother! Hello, Zephiel!

intro.speaker: Zephiel
intro.line: Ah, Guinivere. Have you been well?

intro.speaker: Guinivere
intro.line: Uh-huh! I've been fine. But if you would come and see me every day, I'd be even better! Much, much better!

intro.speaker: Zephiel
intro.line: Every day? Well, that's an awful lot, but I'll come by as often as possible. All for you, dear sister.

intro.speaker: Guinivere
intro.line: Yippee!
Guinivere! Guinivere! Where are you, lass?

intro.speaker: Guinivere
intro.line: Here I am, Father! Welcome home.

intro.speaker: Desmond
intro.line: Ah, there you are. Were you a good girl while I was gone? Come, give your father a kiss. You're as adorable as ever.

intro.speaker: Zephiel
intro.line: Well met, Father.

intro.speaker: Desmond
intro.line: ...Zephiel. Hmph... You take the same unpleasant tone as your mother.

intro.speaker: Zephiel
intro.line: What!? I... I...

intro.speaker: Desmond
intro.line: Silence. What brings you to my castle?

intro.speaker: Zephiel
intro.line: Ah, yes... Murdock.

intro.speaker: Murdock
intro.line: Yes, my lord.

intro.speaker: Zephiel
intro.line: We were hunting in the forest earlier. ...We found this and thought Guinivere might like it.

intro.speaker: Guinivere
intro.line: Eeek! A baby fox!? How cute! It's so very cute!! Is it for me? Really?

intro.speaker: Zephiel
intro.line: Do you like it?

intro.speaker: Guinivere
intro.line: Yes, I do! Thank you. I do love you, Brother!

intro.speaker: Desmond
intro.line: ...Guinivere, go play for a while.

intro.speaker: Guinivere
intro.line: OK! Come on, let's go! You lovely little fox!

intro.speaker: Desmond
intro.line: ...I've told you to stay away from the castle.

intro.speaker: Zephiel
intro.line: Yes...I know... I beg your pardon. I heard that Guinivere was ill and I was...worried.

intro.speaker: Desmond
intro.line: Hah, you mean you came to see if she would die, don't you?

intro.speaker: Zephiel
intro.line: Father...

intro.speaker: Murdock
intro.line: I beg your pardon, Your Majesty, that...

intro.speaker: Desmond
intro.line: Hold your tongue, Murdock! Do not forget whom you serve! The king of Bern!!

intro.speaker: Zephiel
intro.line: It's all right, Murdock...

intro.speaker: Zephiel
intro.line: Father, I would never want to see Guinivere harmed in--

intro.speaker: Desmond
intro.line: You and your mother think of nothing more than stealing my throne. You plague me. Return to the manse!

intro.speaker: Zephiel
intro.line: ...As you wish. I beg your leave...Father.

intro.speaker: Desmond
intro.line: ...No matter how I warn him, he comes. Why is it that the very sight of him tries my patience so? He is truly of my own flesh and blood, yet...
Hee hee hee. It is jealousy, my king.

intro.speaker: Desmond
intro.line: Eh? Who's there?

intro.speaker: Sonia
intro.line: It is I, Sonia.

intro.speaker: Desmond
intro.line: You... Well? Is the Emblem safe?

intro.speaker: Sonia
intro.line: Yes. I have it in my possession. It is all as we planned.

intro.speaker: Desmond
intro.line: It is unlikely, but... The queen might attempt to win the Emblem back. Are you prepared?

intro.speaker: Sonia
intro.line: I will not fail... It is secreted away within the Black Fang's fortress.

intro.speaker: Desmond
intro.line: Keep it concealed until dusk of the tenth day, then return it to me.

intro.speaker: Sonia
intro.line: As you will, Your Grace.

intro.speaker: Desmond
intro.line: And what of my other request...

intro.speaker: Sonia
intro.line: One of the Four Fangs will tend to it. There will be no mistakes. However, General Murdock, the man protecting the prince... He is young, yet well respected. Shall we finish him, too?

intro.speaker: Desmond
intro.line: ...Murdock... His birth is low. And yet his combat skills have won him the title of Wyvern General. It would be a great blow if Bern were to lose him. I'll think of something to remove him from Zephiel's side. Will that do?

intro.speaker: Sonia
intro.line: Yes. It would be a great help. Wait! ......

intro.speaker: Desmond
intro.line: What? What is it?

intro.speaker: Sonia
intro.line: I...sense someone.

intro.speaker: Desmond
intro.line: Where!?
Father! Brother! Where are you?!

intro.speaker: Desmond
intro.line: Do not worry. It is my daughter.

intro.speaker: Sonia
intro.line: Of course. Do not forget the Black Fang's role once we are successful.

intro.speaker: Desmond
intro.line: Of course. Now begone. Quickly.

intro.speaker: Sonia
intro.line: Farewell.

intro.speaker: Guinivere
intro.line: Zephiel! This kit, it... Hm? Where is my brother?

intro.speaker: Desmond
intro.line: He had an errand to perform and left.

intro.speaker: Guinivere
intro.line: Oh, no! No, no, no! I wanted to play!

intro.speaker: Desmond
intro.line: Come, Guinivere. I will play with you.

intro.speaker: Guinivere
intro.line: No! I want to play with him, not you! I'll go and call him back. Here, hold my fox!

intro.speaker: Desmond
intro.line: ......Attend me!!

intro.speaker: Solder
intro.line: Yes, my lord.

intro.speaker: Desmond
intro.line: Take this beast and kill it! Do not let Guinivere know what you do.

intro.speaker: Soldier
intro.line: Understood.

intro.speaker: Desmond
intro.line: ...Zephiel, you knave. Trying to steal my Guinivere's love... ...You will learn your place!

intro.speaker: Hector
intro.line: That was close... I was afraid they'd catch us.

intro.speaker: Eliwood
intro.line: This is worse than I'd imagined. The Black Fang has already reached the king.

intro.speaker: Lyn
intro.line: Their plans for Lycia failed, and now they're targeting Bern.

intro.speaker: Hector
intro.line: If a country as powerful as Bern moves, peace knows no hope.

intro.speaker: Eliwood
intro.line: What Nergal desires is powerful quintessence. Calling dragons back.. Does he wish to embroil the world in chaos? Whatever his plans, he must be stopped at any cost!

intro.speaker: Hector
intro.line: Right. Find the Fire Emblem and return it to the queen. We do that, and she'll point us toward the Shrine of Seals.

intro.speaker: Lyn
intro.line: If we go to the Black Fang fortress...

intro.speaker: Eliwood
intro.line: That's our goal. I must meet with everyone and seek out their fortress.

intro.speaker: Ninian
intro.line: I wonder if Eliwood and the others are well.

intro.speaker: Nils
intro.line: Please, Ninian. That's all you've spoken of since they left. I understand your concern for Lord Eliwood, but...

intro.speaker: Ninian
intro.line: Nils! I...

intro.speaker: Nils
intro.line: You don't have to hide anything from me. But you must not fall in love with him, you know? We...are different from them.

intro.speaker: Ninian
intro.line: ...I know. But I cannot... ......I...

intro.speaker: Nils
intro.line: Ninian! Where are you going?

intro.speaker: Ninian
intro.line: I need time to think. May I be alone, please?

intro.speaker: Nils
intro.line: Ninian...

intro.speaker: Hector
intro.line: We'd better hurry and rejoin the others. Oh, no! Look! It's a wyvern rider!

intro.speaker: Eliwood
intro.line: She's coming closer... Has she seen us?!

intro.speaker: Lyn
intro.line: No, it's not us she's seen. It's... It's Nils!!!

intro.speaker: Eliwood
intro.line: Let's go! Hector!!

intro.speaker: Hector
intro.line: OK!

intro.speaker: Nils
intro.line: Ahh! Who...who are you?

intro.speaker: Vaida
intro.line: Light green hair, crimson eyes... No mistake. You're one of Lord Nergal's lost toys. Yes! Found you at last!

intro.speaker: Nils
intro.line: ...What are you? Why can't I sense you!?

intro.speaker: Vaida
intro.line: What happened to your bodyguards? I heard they were tough. I wanted to see for myself. Well, you're here, so they can't be too far away, can they?

intro.speaker: Vaida
intro.line: C'mon, boy! Scream! Call your friends to you! I grow weary of waiting. I am not known for my patience!!!

intro.speaker: Lyn
intro.line: I'm the one you're looking for! Unhand the boy!

intro.speaker: Vaida
intro.line: You've come! I've been looking forward to this!

intro.speaker: Eliwood
intro.line: Looking forward... What do you mean?

intro.speaker: Vaida
intro.line: The chance to crush you! Then hand the children over to Lord Nergal.

intro.speaker: Hector
intro.line: Nergal? So you're one of his dogs, are you?

intro.speaker: Vaida
intro.line: ...I'll not be called a dog by you, blackheart! True, we've a contract with the Black Fang, but... I am loyal to one master only! He who sits on the throne of Bern!

intro.speaker: Eliwood
intro.line: Then why are you in the employ of the Black--

intro.speaker: Vaida
intro.line: There's been far too much talking. Let's get started, shall we? I've long hungered for someone to test my strength against. Make this last awhile, will you? I want to enjoy this!!

intro.speaker: Vaida
intro.line: Listen up, everyone! It's playtime! Come on out!! The palace has promised to stay out of this! Be as wild as you will!!

intro.speaker: Eliwood
intro.line: Tactician! Our allies are hidden here and there to avoid being spotted. This is not to our advantage. We must gather everyone quickly!!

intro.speaker: Hector
intro.line: Mark! We’re all scattered about and in hiding. The enemy can pick off our weaker members one by one. We’ve got to get together and protect them!

battle.speaker: Vaida
battle.line: Pah! I’ve had it with being pushed here and there! Withdraw!! Ground forces, pull back! And move quickly!!

battle.speaker: Soldier
battle.line: Co-commander Vaida’s been beaten! Run!! While we still have our skins!!

visit.speaker: Man
visit.line: I’ve heard some stories about the Black Fang... I hear they’ve a swordfighter who wields the fearsome Light Brand. No, he’s not here now. But you might run into him somewhere. You should be careful. The Light Brand is a magic sword. It’ll cut you if you’re close and hurl magic at you from afar. Step lightly if you know he’s on the battlefield.

visit.speaker: Woman
visit.line: Do you know anyone named Mark? You see, I once helped out a weary traveler... who just so happened to be a brilliant tactician! Cared for the soldiers... Won battle after battle with no casualties... Ah, I wonder if we’ll meet again...

visit.speaker: Ursula
visit.line: That’s right. You’re with them, right? I know that this isn’t what I’m supposed to do but... I’ll not hand glory over to that newcomer, Vaida... What? Oh, nothing... I’m talking to myself. More importantly, I want to give you this. It’s a hammerne staff. It repairs items. It can make most items like new again. Promise me you’ll bring that wyvern-riding hag down. I’ll be seeing you again, I’m sure. Hee hee...

boss.speaker: Vaida
boss.line: Ha ha... Such a pleasant expression. That settles it. I’ll start with you.

end.speaker: Eliwood
end.line: I guess that worked out.

end.speaker: Ninian
end.line: Lord Eliwood!

end.speaker: Eliwood
end.line: Ninian! Nils! Are you both well?

end.speaker: Nils
end.line: What shall we do, Lord Eliwood? Nergal's power... It's returning bit by bit.

end.speaker: Eliwood
end.line: What do you mean?

end.speaker: Ninian
end.line: That woman you faced... She was protected by Nergal's magic.

end.speaker: Eliwood
end.line: Her strength... It came from Nergal?

end.speaker: Ninian
end.line: Yes. It won't be long before he's active again. With all his power restored.

end.speaker: Nils
end.line: We must hurry and gain the power to oppose him!

end.speaker: Eliwood
end.line: We have to recover the Fire Emblem. If we can do that...

end.speaker: Hector
end.line: Come on! The palace is in an uproar. This is our chance to slip away!

end.speaker: Lyn
end.line: Wait! I have an idea. Let's follow them.

end.speaker: Eliwood
end.line: Lyndis?

end.speaker: Lyn
end.line: Leave it to me. I think I might be able to find the Black Fang fortress.

end.speaker: Lyn
end.line: This way. The signs are fading, but they're really moving. I think I can track them if they keep this pace.

end.speaker: Hector
end.line: Are you sure? Really?

end.speaker: Lyn
end.line: Remember, I'm from Sacae. Bern's foot soldiers are slow and clumsy... And to a Sacaen, men are easier to track than rabbits.

end.speaker: Hector
end.line: What do you want to do, Eliwood.

end.speaker: Eliwood
end.line: Let's put our trust in Lyndis. If anyone can do this, she can.

end.speaker: Hector
end.line: Are you serious?

end.speaker: Lyn
end.line: Over here, everyone!
